category.name: Profile Detectors
category.path: Laser Tools\Profile Detectors

category_idosell.path: Laser Tools\Profile Detectors

description.name: Wall Stud Finder
description.long_desc:
GEKO 3-in-1 Stud Finder Metal and AC live wire detector. Ideal for locating hidden metal pipes, live wire, stud and wooden frames accurately. Stud finder provides 4 scanning modes in total for detection: stud scan mode, DEEP mode, metal scan mode and AC scan.


Product Features



  • Easy to read LCD with backlight display, audio & visual indication

  • Detects metal rebar up to 60mm (2.36")

  • Stud deep scan up to 38mm (1.49")

  • Detects wood stud up to 19mm (0.75")

  • Detects AC live wire up to 51mm (2")

  • Powered by 6F22 9V Battery


Technical Data



  • Size: 160 x 70 x 33 mm

  • Power Source: 6F22 9V Battery
description.short_desc:
GEKO 3-in-1 Stud Finder Metal and AC live wire detector. Ideal for locating hidden metal pipes, live wire, stud and wooden frames accurately. Stud finder provides 4 scanning modes in total for detection: stud scan mode, DEEP mode, metal scan mode and AC scan.


Product Features



  • Easy to read LCD with backlight display, audio & visual indication

  • Detects metal rebar up to 60mm (2.36")

  • Stud deep scan up to 38mm (1.49")

  • Detects wood stud up to 19mm (0.75")

  • Detects AC live wire up to 51mm (2")

  • Powered by 6F22 9V Battery


Technical Data



  • Size: 160 x 70 x 33 mm

  • Power Source: 6F22 9V Battery
description.description:
GEKO 3-in-1 Stud Finder Metal and AC live wire detector. Ideal for locating hidden metal pipes, live wire, stud and wooden frames accurately. Stud finder provides 4 scanning modes in total for detection: stud scan mode, DEEP mode, metal scan mode and AC scan.

  • Easy to read LCD with backlight display, audio & visual indication
